channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
channel.desc: Mum and Dad go out, leaving Boy in charge of the house. However, busy having fun, his siblings totally ignore Boy's rules. Boy calls his old nanny, Miss Molly, who dotes on Boy but treats the others like servants behind his back. When Boy finally realizes, he helps the others to get rid of nasty old Miss Molly forever.
